channel.title: Windows 7 Home Basic 64 Bit Microphone Problem
channel.description: Hi since i installed Skype on my windows 7 HP G61 410SA i can no longer use my microphone ... At first i thought th driver had gone but i went onto the hp website and i cannot find anything about it. Can anybody help me?

item.title: Windows 7 Home Basic 64 Bit Microphone Problem
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

First thought that came to my mind when I read this thread was “is your mic plugged in?”

Glad your problem’s fixed, though

Read full topic
item.source: Windows 7 Home Basic 64 Bit Microphone Problem

item.title: Windows 7 Home Basic 64 Bit Microphone Problem
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

I managed to fix it. I installed the driver for a different model of a HP G61 and it worked fine… thankyou anyway

Read full topic
item.source: Windows 7 Home Basic 64 Bit Microphone Problem

item.title: Windows 7 Home Basic 64 Bit Microphone Problem
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

You have to select your mic under your skype settings, if it is not there then the driver is not installed. Check windows update if you need to find the driver under optional updates. Then look in hardware manager to make sure there is no errors or to see if it even recognizes the microphone.

Read full topic
item.source: Windows 7 Home Basic 64 Bit Microphone Problem

item.title: Windows 7 Home Basic 64 Bit Microphone Problem
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Make sure your audio card drivers are up to date, you might have to try the manufacturers website. HP doesn’t always have all the latest up to date things for hardware pieces that aren’t their own

Chances are it’s the driver. You can also make sure it’s enabled in Start > Control Panel > Hardware and Sound > Sound > Recording(tab) > Make sure the one you’re using is enabled

Read full topic
item.source: Windows 7 Home Basic 64 Bit Microphone Problem
